description: Tactically designed to allow you to move fast and cover water while still providing ample carrying capacity, intuitive features and all-day comfort, the water-resistant 11-liter Stealth Hip Pack is lightweight, body-conforming and won’t hinder your casting stroke. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Stealth Hip Pack

specs.value: 6-oz 100% recycled nylon ripstop with a PU coating on the face and a TPU coating on the backer
3-oz 200-denier 100% recycled polyester with a PU coating
6-oz 100% recycled nylon ripstop with a polyurethane coating on one side and a TPU coating on the reverse

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
